title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Enhancing Fashion Design Creativity Through VR-Based Collaborative Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic fashion design principles and practical industry experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners generate five or more innovative fashion concepts through three or more collaborative inquiry sessions in VR environments
Learners implement real material/color simulations using VR-based design tools and incorporate feedback
Learners iteratively improve design prototypes three or more times through real-time collaboration with peers and submit final project outcomes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
